root.name: Disney's Extremely Goofy Skateboarding
root.description: The game was released in 2001 for the PC. It incorporates four different worlds that the player can use either Goofy or Max to play in. The soundtrack was made by Jack Wall in 2001. It used several different modes to keep the player entertained, such as Tech Session, Shred Session, and other tutorial modes. It featured 3D graphics and allowed young children to pull off many of the tricks that the pros do.
